name: Princess Doll - Dress Up Game
description:
Doll Dress Up game isn't only a costume-changing game but also a place for you to express your fashion personality and create your own character.

Princess game will make a copy of yourself in lovely costumes, eye-catching accessories, ... with just a simple operation to attach them to your doll.


Game Features

- Lots of customization options! Change the doll's clothes, hair and color scheme, from hair to eyes, everything can be customized to make your personal dolls style truly shine.

- Use the animated avatar emoji of your own character to chat with friends. It's also a cute sticker maker for you to edit photos.

- Share decorated pretty doll girl with your friends. You can dressup in different styling of fashion dress to join in a fashion show! Premium costumes make your doll more special.

- Open a fashion runway and become a true fashion designer with Pana Doll - Avatar Maker. A series of colorful outfits for you to freely try with a doll model and create your own style. The fashion superstar is you! jvh
